title: Blacksad Comic Font - Monster Mash from Comicraft
content:
Hi there,

do anyone of you know this font? It is used as the Headline Type on the cover of this Comic below.  
Thanks in advance!

Cheers  
Derya

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128034140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0743479351_4911.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg)
author: yader

comments.content: [Monster Mash](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128034140/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/comicraft/monster-mash/) is close, you might want to check the rest of the [comicraft](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128034140/http:/typophile.com/wiki/comicraft) library or perhaps [blambot](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128034140/http:/typophile.com/wiki/blambot).
